page.title: 06Shopping classification.
page.content: {Glazebrook}has{3 low order}shops,a post office and two mulit-purpose general stores.{2 shops are} {vacant.}Greater customer mobility plus change in shopping habits has meant closure or diversification.{Hollins } {Green}has a greater range of{low}order shops(butcher,chip shop,general store,post office,newsagents,garage & hardware). {Cadishead}has{147}shops,{61% low} {order,15% middle order,2% high and}22% {vacant.}Practicaly all the shops are along{Liverpool Road.}Facilities for the size of settlement are poor.Hypermarket shopping in Irlam & Birchwood,decline of traditional industry plus previous through traffic now using the M62 motorway may be factors. {Partington}has a mixture of low,middle order shops mainly in one{precinct. }
